name: Bear Work
description:
5 lives, 10 levels, realistic physics and time trial game is the most the most hard arkanoid in the world in the style of 8-bit consoles is here!

Control the paddle using the A  and D keys or the arrow keys on the keyboard. Your task is to move the paddle so that the ball collects all the objects on the level.

Arkanoids is a popular and beloved genre of games by many. In them, you control the paddle, hitting the ball and changing its trajectory to hit targets. Our unique version of the game differs from the classic arkanoid thanks to realistic physics and challenging obstacles. Exciting levels full of obstacles and barriers will not let you get bored. Good luck!
